issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Hi All,

Running a 3.3.0 cloud , created a new EBS volume and later tried to attach the same to a running instance. But it failed to get attached.

Running with overlay. Neither newly created volume get attached nor old volumes are getting attached.

All in 1 machine (CLC/Walrus/SC/CC/NC) with MANAGED-NOVLAN networking (typical cloud-in-a-box setup).

Following is in cloud-debug.log when attaching the *newly* created volume

{code}
Sat May 4 20:01:33 2013  INFO [VolumeManager:Volume.7] [com.eucalyptus.records.BaseRecord.info(BaseRecord.java):173] :1367722893720:VolumeManager:vol-35B44179:arn:aws:euare:037261160869:user/admin:VOLUME_ATTACH:instance:i-696341E6
Sat May 4 20:01:33 2013  INFO [VolumeManager:Volume.7] [com.eucalyptus.records.BaseRecord.info(BaseRecord.java):173] :1367722893725:VolumeManager:vol-35B44179:arn:aws:euare:037261160869:user/admin:VOLUME_ATTACH:partition:cloud33
Sat May 4 20:01:33 2013  INFO [VolumeManager:Volume.7] [com.eucalyptus.records.BaseRecord.info(BaseRecord.java):173] :1367722893725:VolumeManager:vol-35B44179:arn:aws:euare:037261160869:user/admin:VOLUME_ATTACH:
Sat May 4 20:01:33 2013 ERROR [VolumeToken:Storage.3] [edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.cloud.entities.VolumeToken.getValidExport(VolumeToken.java):219] Error when checking for valid export to 10.104.1.150 and iqn.1994-05.com.redhat:9862ec4cb2c for volume vol-35B44179 and token LhJhJEP4bWIeP4QdDG0TO0rBlD2L3pYktbTnuk1BDjbZS2K0xDjxy4LUsMQumOTeSG99gpHwFMOlImuj
Sat May 4 20:01:33 2013 ERROR [BlockStorage:Storage.3] [edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.BlockStorage$2.apply(BlockStorage.java):494] Failed when checking/getting valid export for 10.104.1.150 - iqn.1994-05.com.redhat:9862ec4cb2c
Sat May 4 20:01:33 2013 ERROR [BlockStorage:Storage.3] [edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.BlockStorage.ExportVolume(BlockStorage.java):557] Failed ExportVolume transaction due to: Got null record result. Cannot set connection string
java.lang.Exception: Got null record result. Cannot set connection string
	at edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.BlockStorage.ExportVolume(BlockStorage.java:554)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:57)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:601)
	at org.mule.model.resolvers.AbstractEntryPointResolver.invokeMethod(AbstractEntryPointResolver.java:147)
	at org.mule.model.resolvers.ReflectionEntryPointResolver.invoke(ReflectionEntryPointResolver.java:127)
	at org.mule.model.resolvers.DefaultEntryPointResolverSet.invoke(DefaultEntryPointResolverSet.java:50)
	at org.mule.component.DefaultLifecycleAdapter.intercept(DefaultLifecycleAdapter.java:202)
	at org.mule.component.AbstractJavaComponent.invokeComponentInstance(AbstractJavaComponent.java:82)
	at org.mule.component.AbstractJavaComponent.doOnCall(AbstractJavaComponent.java:73)
	at org.mule.component.AbstractComponent.onCall(AbstractComponent.java:87)
	at org.mule.model.seda.SedaService$ComponentStageWorker.run(SedaService.java:533)
	at org.mule.work.WorkerContext.run(WorkerContext.java:310)
	at edu.emory.mathcs.backport.java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:665)
	at edu.emory.mathcs.backport.java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:690)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)
Sat May 4 20:01:33 2013 ERROR [AsyncRequest:Eucalyptus.cluster:ClusterConfiguration:arn:euca:eucalyptus:cloud33:cluster:cc-01/.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#266] [com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequest$2.call(AsyncRequest.java):232] java.lang.RuntimeException: com.eucalyptus.util.async.FailedRequestException: Cluster response includes _return=false:AttachVolumeResponseType:null:return=false:epoch=null:status=ERROR
Sat May 4 20:01:34 2013  INFO [OverlayManager:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:Callbacks:class com.eucalyptus.util.async.Callbacks$BasicCallbackProcessor.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#216] [com.eucalyptus.storage.OverlayManager.doUnexport(OverlayManager.java):1283] Cleaning up volume: vol-35B44179
Sat May 4 20:01:34 2013 ERROR [SystemUtil:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:Callbacks:class com.eucalyptus.util.async.Callbacks$BasicCallbackProcessor.class java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker#216] [edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.util.SystemUtil.run(SystemUtil.java):96] com.eucalyptus.util.EucalyptusCloudException:   Volume group "euca-ebs-storage-vg-vol-35B44179" not found
  Skipping volume group euca-ebs-storage-vg-vol-35B44179

com.eucalyptus.util.EucalyptusCloudException:   Volume group "euca-ebs-storage-vg-vol-35B44179" not found
  Skipping volume group euca-ebs-storage-vg-vol-35B44179

	at edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.util.SystemUtil.run(SystemUtil.java:92)
	at com.eucalyptus.storage.LVMWrapper.logicalVolumeExists(LVMWrapper.java:173)
	at com.eucalyptus.storage.OverlayManager.doUnexport(OverlayManager.java:1286)
	at com.eucalyptus.storage.OverlayManager.unexportVolumeFromAll(OverlayManager.java:329)
	at edu.ucsb.eucalyptus.cloud.ws.BlockStorage.detachVolume(BlockStorage.java:1217)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:57)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:601)
	at org.mule.model.resolvers.AbstractEntryPointResolver.invokeMethod(AbstractEntryPointResolver.java:147)
	at org.mule.model.resolvers.ReflectionEntryPointResolver.invoke(ReflectionEntryPointResolver.java:127)
	at org.mule.model.resolvers.DefaultEntryPointResolverSet.invoke(DefaultEntryPointResolverSet.java:50)
	at org.mule.component.DefaultLifecycleAdapter.intercept(DefaultLifecycleAdapter.java:202)
	at org.mule.component.AbstractJavaComponent.invokeComponentInstance(AbstractJavaComponent.java:82)
	at org.mule.component.AbstractJavaComponent.doOnCall(AbstractJavaComponent.java:73)
	at org.mule.component.AbstractComponent.onCall(AbstractComponent.java:87)
	at org.mule.model.seda.SedaService.doSend(SedaService.java:234)
	at org.mule.service.AbstractService.sendEvent(AbstractService.java:510)
	at org.mule.module.client.MuleClient.sendDirect(MuleClient.java:352)
	at com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceContext.send(ServiceContext.java:192)
	at com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceContext.send(ServiceContext.java:181)
	at com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequests.sendSync(AsyncRequests.java:113)
	at com.eucalyptus.cluster.callback.VolumeAttachCallback.fireException(VolumeAttachCallback.java:136)
	at com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequest$1.fireException(AsyncRequest.java:106)
	at com.eucalyptus.util.async.Callbacks$BasicCallbackProcessor.doFail(Callbacks.java:160)
	at com.eucalyptus.util.async.Callbacks$BasicCallbackProcessor.run(Callbacks.java:151)
	at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:471)
	at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java:334)
	at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:166)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1145)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:615)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)
{code}

Have tried rebooting the machine multiple times without any luck. Let me know if more logs are required to debug this issue, this is running inside the PRC.

Cheers!
Deependra
fields.summary: cannot attach EBS to an instance

comments.body:
All log files are available on the following link:

http://jeevanullas.in/tmp/logs.tar.bz

The dump of database is available on the following link:

http://jeevanullas.in/tmp/db.tar.bz2

If access to the system is required , let me know , I will share the details.
The cloud has been running for past few months , on source build, regular updates are pulled from testing branch, rebuilt and applied.
Please make sure you start from scratch. DB upgrades are not supported while in dev. DB schema has changed several times. Please reset DB, re-register components and reopen if necessary. Thanks!
Thanks. I setup freshly and now I cannot detach an EBS, raised a new ticket for it https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/browse/EUCA-6064
